name: Forgotten Persona #4
description:
Animated GIF | 6 fps| 2048 x 2048 | RGB | sRGB IEC61966-2.1

When I start drawing, I don't know yet what it will be. With each frame that I draw, the sketch is formed, step by step, into a figure. A person from my imagination, or maybe even a memory. A deceased person.
The light around, seeks the accents, which I need to perceive this forgotten someone.
